metadata.title: CVE-2019-19636 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libsixel 1.8.2. There is an integer overflow in the function sixel_encode_body at tosixel.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19636` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.6-1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.6-1
libsixel1 - 1.8.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.6-1').
